entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning near noon then changing to flurries at times heavy early this afternoon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
